definitions.text: a building or place that provides a particular service or is used for a particular industry
examples: the assembly plant is an enormous facility

definitions.text: skillful performance or ability without difficulty
examples: his quick adeptness was a product of good design
he was famous for his facility as an archer

definitions.text: something designed and created to serve a particular function and to afford a particular convenience or service
a service that an organization or a piece of equipment offers you
examples: a cell phone with internet facility
